definition: a devoted, almost religiously so, adherent of a cause, person, or activity
details:
noun
- a devoted, almost religiously so, adherent of a cause, person, or activity
= example: a devoted, almost religiously so, adherent of a cause, person, or activity
- a priest or priestess in a non-Christian religion or cult
= example: a priest or priestess in a non-Christian religion or cult
- one bound by vows to a religion or life of worship or service
= example: one bound by vows to a religion or life of worship or service
